text: hello and welcome to cupcake addictions
Despicable Me minions cake pop tutorial
where I'll be showing how to make these

put some melted black candy melts I've
got some blue and yellow chocolate now
I've chosen to tint some white chocolate
using either powdered color or color

I've got a little spoon I've got brown
m'aimes both regular-sized and mini and

now these are into the candies that come
on candy necklaces and candy bracelets
thank you bye for the kids and I've just

the first thing that we want to do is

round and you're happy with the look
that is going to be sort of minion esque
but you should have something that looks

once that one comes out of the fridge
you want to take your ball not on the

about the third of the
that's going to be his pants so just dip
